DOC.brief_summary: Monocentric pilot interventional study. The aim of the study is to assess clitoral doppler ultrasonographic parameters in a population of sexually healthy volunteer women in order to obtain reference values. Psychobiological correlates of female sexual function will also be studied through hormonal testing and psychological evaluation.
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound and Psychobiological Correlates of Female Sexual Function
DOC.criteria: sexually healthy evidence of a personally signed and dated informed consent. any uncontrolled or unstable, acute or chronic disease alcohol or drugs abuse sexual dysfunction any overt psychiatric or psychological condition assessed through psychological evaluation and/or selfadministered validated questionnaires.
